name: Apply for a Permit to Replace a Luxury Vehicle to Transport Passengers in Luxury Vehicles

fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: Does the plate reservation transaction allow the company to extend the period of the plate reservation on the replacement permit?

Answer 1: No, the plate reservation transaction doesn’t allow to extend the period of reservation on the permit in case the 90 days period ended, a supplementary permit is required to determine the reservation period or to replace the plates.

  • Question 2: What is the initial replacement permit?

Answer 2: It is the permit issued with the first removal of a vehicle from the traffic file after completing the registration of the contracted number of vehicles and ends with the expiration of the contract.

  • Question 3: What is the sub replacement permit?

Answer 3: The sub permit is issued for each vehicle removed from traffic file. It is valid for 90 days starting from the date of removing the vehicle from the traffic file.

  • Question 4: What is the replacement supplementary permit?

Answer 4: It is a permit issued to extend the reservation of a plate for 90 days after the expiration of the replacement permit issued for the removed vehicle without registering the replacement.
fields.Process:
Initial permit

Through customer happiness centres or service providers

  • The customer removes the vehicle from the traffic file (possession, transfer, sale, changing ownership...)
  • The customer registers the vehicle according to the requirements of the Licensing Department within 90 days from removing the vehicle from the traffic file.

Replacement supplementary permit

Through the website

  • The customer logs in to the company’s account through RTA website and proceeds to Company Dashboard
  • The system showcases the supplementary permits types that the company is allowed to apply for
  • The company selects the type of permit and submits a proof of commitment to register the vehicles
  • The system automatically checks if the company regularly settles its post-dated cheques and bank/cash guarantees related to the operation fees and has no due fines, then allows the submission of the application
  • The Franchise Services Department checks and approves the application.
fields.Output:
• Replacement permit linked to the contract of the company
  • Plates reserved for 90 days for each vehicle removed from the traffic file.
fields.Service Fees:
• Replacement permit is free
  • + Vehicle registration fees.
fields.Validity: • 90 days starting from the date of removing the vehicle from the traffic file, during which the plate numbers are kept reserved on the traffic file of the company.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must complete at least once the registration of the contracted number of vehicles for the system to allow the creation of a replacement permit
  • The replacement permit is issued after removing the first vehicle from the traffic file
  • The company can extend the permit period by applying for the Replacement supplementary permit through the company’s account on the website (Company Dashboard) where the plates reservation is extended for 90 days
  • Removing a vehicle from the traffic file means selling a vehicle, possession of a vehicle, exporting a vehicle and transferring its ownership
  • The vehicles must be on the approved list of vehicles for this activity
  • The company cannot register the vehicles on the permit without providing the needed bank/cash guarantees and post-dated cheques for the monthly fees
  • The year of manufacturing the vehicle must be the current one or the one before
  • The company cannot register administrative vehicles
  • If the company failed to register a new vehicle instead of the removed one within 90 days, the permit is cancelled and the plates are withdrawn from the company’s traffic file to the Electronic franchise agreements and permits system. The company can complete the registration of the replaced vehicles by applying for a replacement supplementary permit
  • Used vehicle registration terms: to check the procedures, fees and terms and conditions click on Apply for a Permit to Register a Used Vehicle to Transport Passengers in Luxury Vehicles service
  • Extended vehicle registration terms: to check the procedures, fees and terms and conditions click on Apply for a Permit to Register an Extended Vehicle to Transport Passengers in Luxury Vehicles service

name: Apply for a Permit to Reserve Part of the Right-of-Way or Sand Yards for Occasions

fields.Output: Wedding/funeral tent permit.
fields.Service Fees: • This service is free.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• Refer to Dubai Municipality, the Civil Defence Department, DEWA, and Dubai Police to complete the rest of the procedures
  • Allow a distance of 7 meters from the Right of Way to set up the tent on sandy areas, respecting the designated setup area
  • Get the neighbour’s approval in case the tent was set up in front of the neighbouring house (the tent shall be removed if requested by the neighbour)
  • Abide by all the traffic and road signage and safety requirements on site, as agreed upon with the Traffic Department
  • Abide by the designated dates to avoid penalty
  • The permit is doomed cancelled in case any of the mentioned information was deleted or crossed out
  • Only the original permit is valid, not the copies
  • Make way for the Police, Ambulance and Civil Defence vehicles
  • It is not allowed to place any signs (Wedding / Funeral) on the Right of Way
  • The customer must apply online 3 days before the wedding.
fields.Process:
Through website (Wedding tents)

  • The customer submits the required information and documents
  • RTA staff provide the approvals required for the proposed work
  • The customer settles the fees and receives the permit letter and approved drawing.

Through call centre (funeral tents)

  • The customer contacts the call centre which in turn provides the needed details to obtain the permit.
fields.Description: This service enables you to obtain a permit to set up tents for a wedding or condolences on part of the Right of Way (ROW).
fields.Eligibility: UAE Citizens are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Letter with all details of the request from the company (Dubai only)
  2. Copy of valid DED trade license (Dubai only) of company that will set-up the tent
  3. Copy of land owner passport
  4. Copy of affection plan from Dubai Municipality
  5. Marriage contract (Wedding tent).

fields.Service Fees:
• 220 AED to issue or renew a utilisation permit along with the value of the permit in accordance with the formula adopted by the Roads and Transport Authority
  • 10,000 insurance fees
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must leave a space of at least 2m for the movement of pedestrians
  • The customer must make sure that flower and plant containers are not anchored to the pavement and their space does not exceed 1m
  • The customer must make sure that sunshades are not anchored to the pavement, do not cover all the utilised area and maintain the overall aesthetic appearance
  • The customer must make sure that chairs and sunshades will not block the view of drivers and will not affect the general safety of pedestrians
  • The customer is not allowed to use rugs to cover the utilised area
  • The customer is not allowed to install concrete columns that are higher than 1m and is also not allowed to install lampposts unless in certain ways specified by concerned departments so not to be reflective or have any influence on the traffic safety
  • The customer is not allowed to install televisions or any over screening machines in the utilised area on the pavement or in any other place that might affect the traffic safety
  • The customer is not allowed to place statues or sculptures in a way that affects the movement of pedestrians.

fields.Description: This service enables you to issue a new permit to work as a taxi driver.
fields.Eligibility: Drivers of franchise companies are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Letter from the company
  2. Medical fitness test
  3. Clear criminal record certificate
  4. Copy of the driving license issued in the United Arab Emirates

name: Apply for a Personal nol Card

fields.Description:
This service enables you to apply for a personal nol card (blue card), which has the same features of Silver/Gold Cards and comes with different categories and concessions (Adult, Senior Citizen, people of determination and Students).

Silver/Gold Anonymous cards can be registered yet without any Specific category or concession.
fields.Eligibility: All customers above 5 years old are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
Adults:

  • Both sides copy of the Emirates ID
  • Personal photograph with a white background (for personal cards only)

People of determination:

  • Personal Photo
  • Both sides copy of the Emirates ID
  • Sanad Card

Students (From 6 to 23 years old)

  • Valid Copy of Emirates ID
  • School Letter
  • Personal Photo

Senior Citizen (Customer above the age of 60)

  • Personal Photo
  • Both sides copy of the Emirates ID

Social Affairs

  • Valid Copy of Emirates ID
  • A valid letter from the Community Development Authority stating that the customer is entitled to Social Security
fields.Channels - Service Centres: • Zoom shops at metro stations for the regular category (adults)
fields.Output:
• nol personal card (blue card)
  • Silver/Gold registered nol card
  • Personal nol card with special design (if requested)
fields.Service Fees:
• 70 AED for Personal (blue) silver nol card; including an e-wallet value of 20 AED and 50 AED application fees
  • 80 AED for Personal (blue) gold nol; including an e-wallet value of 20 AED, 50 AED application fees and 10 AED for card design
  • 30 AED for Service fees for Silver/Gold Anonymous card registration
  • 100 AED for Personal (blue) nol special design card. Including:
    • 50 AED for the personal card
    • 30 AED for the special design
    • 20 AED as e-wallet value
  • Students (age 6 to 23), social affairs and senior citizen aged 60 years and above (of all nationalities) benefit from a 50% discount on public transport fares when using the metro, bus and Dubai Tram.
  • People of determination benefit from 100% discount on (Metro, Tram and Buses).
  • Children below 6 years of age benefit from 100% discount on (Metro, Tram and Buses).
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• Student card: The student’s age must be between 6 and 23 years.
  • Senior card: The customer’s age must be 60 years and above.
  • The customer must have the PIN code of the card for personal and registered cards.
  • In case of any delay in receiving the card, the customer can contact RTA call centre on the following number 8009090.
  • The customer can also follow up on the process through the website or the mobile application.
  • In case of applying for this service online, the attachments must be in png or jpeg format and their size must be less than 2 MB.
  • Only adults are eligible to apply in Zoom shops through nol express service.
fields.Process:
Through online channels

  • The customer fills in the application form of the service on the website or the mobile application (type of the card, category, personal information, ID information, contact information and address).
  • The customer uploads the scanned required documents.
  • The customer settles the fees by credit card or debit card.
  • The customer receives an SMS including the number of the card and delivery courier number of the courier company.
  • The customer receives the card and the PIN code that enables him/her to update the card's file through the website or the mobile application.

Through Zoom shops in metro stations (for Adults only) nol express service

  • The customer heads to Zoom shop at the metro station.
  • The customer presents the ID to the employee.
  • The customer pays the fees in cash.
  • The customer receives the card.
fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: Can the customer use the personal nol card of another person?

Answer 1: No, the nol card must be used by the card owner.

  • Question 2: How can the customer cancel a lost card?

Answer 2: The customer can cancel the card through the website. The customer must provide the card number and its PIN code that he received by SMS when receiving the approval.

The customer can also cancel the card through the IVR system by contacting the call centre on 8009090

  • Question 3: What happens after the customer requests disabling a personal silver or gold card?

Answer 3: The card will be added to the blacklist and will be cancelled upon the customer's request.

  • Question 4: What’s the procedure if the customer wants to activate the identified personal (blue) if it is not working?

Answer 4: The customer should be guided to the nearest TOM (Ticket Office Machine) in order to activate the card. If the card is not working, the customer can swipe it at any metro gate to activate it.

  • Question 5: What is the pin code for?

Answer 5: Once the nol Blue Card is issued, you will receive an SMS with your pin code. This pin code is required for activating your card, reporting if your card is lost or stolen and also for registering for online services.

  • Question 6: Who will deliver the nol blue card?

Answer 6: A company registered in RTA delivers the card to the customer.

  • Question 7: Can the customer add more than 1 personal nol card to his online account?

Answer 7: Yes, the customer can visit RTA website to add more than one personalized card to his account.

  • Question 8: What are the features of the identified (blue) personal nol Card?

Answer 8: nol Personal Card is a personalized smart card with an e-wallet that can be loaded with up to AED 5,000. It can be used on all modes of transport, retails shops, accessing museums and public gardens, etc.

It has a secure card balance in case of loss or theft, and a variety of secure & personalized online services. Customers receive SMS & email notifications to keep them posted on their daily transactions.

With this new card the people of determination can move freely in Dubai using buses and metro, and students of all nationalities and Senior Emiratis can use public transport at half price.

name: Apply for a Proposed Plot Gate Level

fields.Process:
Through RTA website

  • The customer submits the request through the website.
  • The customer uploads the scanned required documents.
  • The customer receives an acceptance or rejection letter through the website.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must submit a new request for approval in case of an expired request
  • The approved gate level should be consistent with the adjacent Plot's gate levels/utility manhole levels issued by RTA or originally existing
  • The customer must refer to RTA in case of any discrepancy related to meeting the conditions
  • RTA reserves the right to reissue or reconsider the gate levels if required.
fields.Service Fees: • This service is free.
fields.Output: Gate level approval.
fields.Eligibility: Private building owners, consultants, contractors and government agencies are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Affection plan
  2. Detailed topographic survey including existing adjacent building gates, manholes, substation, boundary wall / fence and paved road levels, etc.
  3. Site pictures for existing adjacent features
  4. Proposed Building’s setting-out plan (Optional)
  5. RTA approved road design layout - For Private Developers’ cases only
  6. Proposed Gate level by the Consultant of the Developer (Signed and stamped), For Private Developers’ cases only.
fields.Description:
This service enables you to apply for a proposed plot gate level which is the relative height of the plot entrance above the road level (the road going by the plot).

The gate level for any plot is a basic requirement of Dubai Municipality if the customer wants to get a building permit.

fields.Description: This service enables you to obtain a permit to use the public parking plots with codes A, B, C, and D surrounding the premises of the consulate requesting the permit, within a radius of 250m.

1. Approval letter from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Dubai
  2. Valid ownership of the vehicles, under which plate numbers the permit will be issued.

fields.Service Fees: This service is free.
fields.Validity: One year renewable based on the same conditions and procedures unless the concerned department judges best for the public interest to cancel the permits.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• Each consulate is entitled to maximum 2 permits
  • Notify the diplomatic entities authorized to manage the parking plots about any changes in the information of the vehicles granted the permit
  • In case of applying through the website, the permit is not printed and the customer doesn't have to display it in the car. The virtual permit is linked to cars mentioned by the customer when applying
  • The permit is not valid for reserved parking spaces.
fields.Process Time:
• Customer happiness centres: 2 working days.
  • Website: from 2 to 5 days.
fields.Process:
Through website

  • The customer logs in to RTA website
  • The customer chooses "Apply for a Public Parking Permit for a Diplomatic Body" service
  • The customer fills the required details and submits the required documents
  • The customer receives the response (approval/rejection) through SMS
  • In case of approval, the customer can check the permit details through the website.

Through customer happiness centres

  • The customer submits the required documents at the centre
  • The customer receives the permit in the form of a plastic or paper card or any other form approved by the agency for that purpose, to be used by the governmental entity or its agents.

name: Apply for a Right-of-Way Landscape Permit

fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: Is the customer allowed to place flower pots?

Answer 1: Yes, as long as these pots do not hinder the pedestrian path and do not affect the traffic safety.

  • Question 2: Is the customer allowed to plant palm trees and other trees in accordance with this permit?

Answer 2: No, the customer is not allowed to plant the above-mentioned trees.
fields.Process:
Through customer happiness centre

  • The customer presents the required documents to the concerned engineer
  • The customer agrees to the conditions
  • The customer receives the permit from the centre.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The owner of the land or the legal representative must agree on the below conditions:
    • The customer must have the approval of other concerned service authorities
    • The digging must be done manually to protect the service lines
    • The customer must carry out maintenance works to preserve the beauty of the site
    • The customer must remove all plants upon the request of any governmental party, noting that this party is not responsible for replanting the site
    • If the customer does not have a design, he must comply with the design provided by the Roads Landscaping Section
    • The owner is in charge of implementing all the above conditions and other conditions related to the adopted design at his own expense
    • The customer must not place any element that hinders the pedestrian path
  • The customer cannot plant palm trees or any other kind of trees before having the approval of the No Objection Certificates (NOC) Section
  • If the NOC section does not approve the planting of trees, planting will be limited to landscaping, flowers, ground covers , grass and shallow roots shrubs.
fields.Output: Landscaping permit.
fields.Service Fees: • This service is free.
fields.Channels - Customer Happiness Centres: • Customer Happiness Centre - Umm Ramool
fields.Description: This service enables you to obtain a permit to add soft landscaping areas on the roads without planting trees.
fields.Eligibility: Individual customers and companies are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Affection plan from Dubai Municipality
  2. Landscaping design
  3. Photographs of the site.

Through service centre

  • The customer settles the fees
  • The customer receives the permit.
fields.Terms and Conditions: • The Inspection Department at the Right of Way has the right to issue a warning or a violation ticket against companies that use a part of the road without having a permit.
fields.Validity: The validity varies according to the condition and the type of the request.
fields.Service Fees:
• 200 AED permit fees.
  • Refundable deposit according to the area (if applicable)
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Output: Permit to close a street for a public event.
fields.Channels - Service Centres: • RTA Headquarter - Mailroom section
fields.Required Documents:
1. Covering letter describing the details and duration of the required works addressed to the Manager of RTA Right Of Way Services section
  2. Proper Layout on a suitable scale showing as existing conditions with the proposed closure, alternative roads, and the traffic diversion as per Dubai WZTM manual considering all safety measures as per RTA standards
  3. Copy of company’s Trade License (Dubai only)
  4. NOC from other concerned authorities
  5. Copy of old permits and drawings (in case of renewal).
fields.Description: This service enables you to obtain a permit for closing roads in Dubai for any public event such as marathons or rallies or parades of all types, etc.
fields.Eligibility: Governmental authorities and private companies are eligible to apply for this service.

name: Apply for a Safari Driving Permit

fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: What are the details pertaining to driving violations in the desert?

Answer 1: For details about driving violations in the desert without a permit, the customer is requested to check with the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing or Dubai Police (Department of Tourism Security).
fields.Process Time: • 1 visit to the driving training institute/centre.
fields.Eligibility: Individual customers, citizens and residents, who have a light vehicle driving license issued in UAE, and work at a tourism company that organize safaris are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Process:
Through driving institutes

  • The customer submits the required documents at the institute
  • The customer undergoes the training and then takes the test in the presence of an examiner from the Roads and Transport Authority (RTA)
    • In case of failure, the customer undergoes additional training and books another date to take the test
    • In case of success, the customer receives a safari driving permit for 1 year.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The residents must be sponsored by a tourism company.
  • The customer must be 21 years old and above.
  • The customer must have a valid driving license issued in UAE for a minimum of 2 years
  • The customer must be medically fit (Must have a valid eye test results)
  • The customer must pass the training program for tourist guide (Safari) by the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing
  • The customer must pass all the tests assessed by the agency.
fields.Channels - Driving Institutes:
• Belhasa Driving Institute
  • Emirates Driving Institute
  • Galadari Motor Driving Centre
  • Al Ahli Driving Centre.
fields.Output: Safari driving permit.
fields.Service Fees:
• 300 AED permit fees
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Original Emirates ID
  2. Applicant file at the institute.
fields.Description: This service enables you to apply for a safari driving permit from the Emirate of Dubai.

Answer 1: For details about driving violations in the desert without a permit, the customer must check with the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing or Dubai Police (Department of Tourism Security).

  • The employee checks the availability of the eye test results online
  • The customer pays the required fees
  • The customer receives a safari learning permit.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The residents must be sponsored by a tourism company
  • The customer must be 21 years old and above
  • The customer must have a valid driving license issued in UAE for a minimum of 2 years
  • The customer must be medically fit (Must have a valid eye test results)
  • The customer must pass the training program for tourist guide (Safari) by the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing.
fields.Service Fees:
• 200 AED permit fees
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Output: Safari learning permit.
fields.Channels - Driving Institutes:
• Belhasa Driving Institute
  • Emirates Driving Institute
  • Galadari Motor Driving Centre
  • Al Ahli Driving Centre.
fields.Description: This service enables you to apply for a safari driving learning permit.
fields.Eligibility: Individual customers, citizens and residents, who have a light vehicle driving license issued in UAE, and work at a tourism company that organize safaris are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Original Emirates ID
  2. No Objection Certificate (NOC) from the tourism company where the customer works
  3. Criminal record Certificate.

name: Apply for a Salik Monthly Account Statement

fields.FAQs: Follow this Link to check Salik related FAQs.
fields.Process:
Through mobile application and website (The statement can be viewed on mobile application only for the past 30 days. Through website statement can be viewed only for the past 6 months)

  • The customer logs in using the username and password
  • The customer proceeds to the Trips/Statements section
  • The customer enters the dates of the desired statement
  • The statement appears on the screen.

Through Salik self service on Salik call centre (the customer can view the statement of the past 6 months)

  • The customer logs in using the account number and the PIN code
  • The customer proceeds to the statement option
  • The customer enters the dates of the desired statement
  • The customer can retrieve the statement by Fax or email.

Through call centre (the customer can view the statement of the past 6 months)

  • The customer contacts the call centre on the following number: 80072545
  • The call centre will guide the customer to send an email to customerservice@salik.ae with the following information:

    • Name and mobile number
    • Account number and PIN code
    • Requested statement dates (start and end dates)
    • For companies: trade license.

Note: The email must be written on the company’s letterhead.

  • The customer receives the statement via email.
fields.Output: Salik statement for the requested period.
fields.Service Fees: • This service is free.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• This service is no longer available at the Salik service centres
  • The customers can only view their financial statement online.
fields.Channels - Call Centre:
• Salik Self Service on Salik Call Centre: 800-72545
  • Salik customer service representative: 800-72545.
fields.Description: This service enables you to view the monthly Salik statements that include both Salik trips and recharges.
fields.Eligibility: All owners of Salik accounts are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents: This service has no required documents.

name: Apply for a Short Term Bus Rental

fields.Output: Providing a bus, driver, and route.
fields.Service Fees: • The service fees vary according to the contractual agreement between the customer and the Roads and Transport Authority (RTA).
fields.Validity: The validity varies according to the contractual agreement between the customer and RTA (between 1 day and 6 months).
fields.Terms and Conditions: • The customer must sign a new contract if he desires to renew the agreement.
fields.Process:
Through website

  • The customer submits the request through Tajeer website
  • The customer fills in the required form
  • The customer receives a call from the employee to complete the application.
fields.Description:
This service enables you to rent a bus from the Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) to commute during events and conferences inside Dubai and other emirates.

Many of these buses are allocated for this service. These buses that exist in 4 types are known for their luxury and unprecedented comfort, their technical specifications and for being environment friendly which makes transport in them an unforgettable experience.
fields.Eligibility: All individuals who work for the business sector, commercial companies, governmental agencies, members of clubs and VIPs are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents: 1. Official letter from the individual or the company willing to receive the service.
fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: How can I have more details about this service?

Answer 1: You must check the manual of renting a bus or Tajeer website or contact the call centre (8009090) or check RTA website.

  • Question 2: What is the procedure if the customer loses his belongings in the bus or finds someone else belongings?

Answer 2: For lost and found items, the customer must provide the details of the item as well as the details of the trip and a contact number when presenting a request to RTA’s call centre (8009090).

name: Apply for a Statement of Registered Vehicles

fields.Process Time:

  • Customer happiness centres and service providers: 10 minutes
  • Call centre: Instantly.
fields.Output: Statement of registered vehicles.
fields.Service Fees:

  • 1,000 AED if the traffic file has more than 100 vehicles
  • + 20 AED Innovation and Knowledge fees.
fields.Terms and Conditions: • The customer or the company representative must be present in person.

  • The customer proceeds to the service of “printing a detailed statement of registered vehicles”
  • The customer pays all due finesThe customer is required to settle the fees by credit card

name: Apply for a Temporary Parking Permit for People of Determination

fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: What are the types of parking permits?

Answer 1: There are 6 types of parking permits:

  1. Permit for people of determination: this permit does not require a medical report if the customer has a special needs card
  2. Permit for people with temporary disabilities
  3. Permit for senior emiratis: this permit does not require a medical report
  4. Permit for people with special medical cases: this permit is specialized for people who periodically visit a hospital. The customer must wait 5 days to receive the approval of the medical committee on the presented medical report. The customer must also have a registered vehicle in Dubai, or a proof of residence or work
  5. Special permits for schools, companies and taxis (people of determination): there is no need for a medical report
  6. Special permit for tourists valid for 3 months: the customer must present the special needs card issued in the country of origin in Arabic and English or must present a medical report

Note: Customers can apply to receive a lost or damaged permit for all types. All permits can be renewed except that of the tourists.
fields.Process:
Through the website

  • The customer logs in to RTA website and chooses "Temporary Permit for People of Determination" service
  • The customer fills in the requested details and submits the required documents
  • The customer receives RTA reply (approval or rejection) through SMS after 5 working days
  • In case of approval the customer receives the permit through the courier company without any extra charges.

Through customer happiness centres

  • The customer presents the required documents at the service centre
  • The customer waits 5 days to receive the approval of the medical committee on the presented medical report
  • The customer receives the permit through the courier company without any extra charges.
fields.Output: Parking permit for people of determination - Temporary permit.
fields.Service Fees: This service is free.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The permit must be used in Dubai only
  • The person who has the permit must be inside the vehicle when using the parking spot or else a fine will be issued.
fields.Description: This service enables you to apply for a temporary parking permit for people of determination.
fields.Eligibility: Citizens and residents of determination are eligible to apply for this service.

  1. Copy of Emirates ID or valid Marsoom or valid ID for citizens
  2. Original "People of determination" card issued by the Ministry of Community Development or "Sanad Card" issued by the Community Development Authority or a not-more than 6 month-old medical report indicating the customer's health condition
  3. Copy of the passport
  4. Personal photograph of the customer.

Through customer happiness centres

  1. Copy of the passport for residents
  2. Emirates ID + copy
  3. Copy of the residence visa for the residents
  4. Proof of Dubai citizenship, or a residence visa from Dubai, or a registered vehicle in Dubai, or a proof that the customer resides in Dubai
  5. Medical report not older than 3 months indicating the customer's medical condition.

name: Apply for a Temporary Permit to Transport Passengers from Dubai to Other Emirates or the Opposite (Naqel Service)

fields.FAQs:
Question 1: Are buses from other emirates allowed to pick up and drop off passengers from Dubai airport?

  • Answer 1: No, buses are allowed to pick up and drop off passengers inside Dubai (excluding airports) and also in places previously specified on Naqel by the company. The company has the right to specify 2 locations for each contract and is allowed to have 4 contracts.

Question 2: What are the fines in case of transporting passengers without a permit?

  • Answer 2: Reference to the UAE Cabinet Decision (6) of 2016 on organizing the transport of passengers in luxury vehicles in Dubai, the fines of transporting passengers before obtaining a permit are 20,000 AED.

Reference to the UAE Cabinet Decision (33) of 2011 on organizing the transport of passengers in buses in Dubai, the fines of transporting passengers before obtaining a permit are10,000 AED.

Question 3: Are luxury vehicles from other emirates allowed to pick up and drop off passengers arriving from other emirates and transport them to locations other than the airports?

  • Answer 3: Luxury vehicles are allowed to pick up passengers from airports in case of having a permit.

Question 4: Is it obligatory to have an occupational permit for the driver after obtaining the permit?

  • Answer 4: The customer must provide an occupational permit for drivers with a validity of 1 year on the condition of having a permit for the vehicle.

The required documents for this permit are:

  1. A recent photo
  2. Copy of the driver’s valid driving license
  3. Copy of the passport
  4. Copy of the valid visa
  5. Copy of the valid ID
  6. NOC to receive an occupational permit from the company where the driver works
  7. Copy of the occupational permit issued by the transport authority of the concerned emirate.

Question 5: What is the procedure if the permit is expired?

  • Answer 5: The company must request a new permit.

Question 6: What is the procedure in case of changing the company that was agreed on in the permit?

  • Answer 6: The company can amend the permit request.

Question 7: What are the fees for amending the request?

  • Answer 7: 120 AED.

Question 8: Can the customer apply for both vehicle permit and occupational permit for drivers at the same time?

  • Answer 8: No, it is required to have a valid vehicle permit to apply for occupational permit for drivers.
fields.Process:
Through the website

  • The customer creates an account on RTA website to benefit from this service
  • The customer chooses "Business & Corporate Services" (Naqel Service) after having the approval and activating the account
  • The customer follows the steps to upload the required documents
  • RTA reviews the request and sends an SMS and email to the customer to inform him of accepting or rejecting the request
  • The Customer will receive an SMS and e-mail for online payment, after RTA approval.
  • The Customer receives the permit details and receipt through email once the payment is completed online.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The company must have an account on the Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) website
  • The company must specify roads and pick up and drop off points inside the emirate (for rented buses)
  • Picking up passengers in luxury vehicles is only possible from Dubai airport
  • The drivers must have a permit from the Administration of Drivers' Affairs
  • The number of contracts with beneficiary companies must not exceed 4.
fields.Validity:
• Companies that transport passengers in rented buses: 1 week/1 month/6 months/1 year
  • Companies that transport passengers in luxury vehicles: between 1 month and 1 year.

name: Apply for a Vehicle Export Certificate

fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: What is the procedure if the customer applies for the export certificate from Dubai and then changes his mind and decides to register the vehicle in another emirate?

Answer 1: The customer must check with the service centre to get a possession certificate to register the vehicle in another emirate.

  • Question 2: What is the procedure if the customer loses the export certificate and the certificate is expired and the vehicle is outside the UAE?

Answer 2: The customer must apply for a new export certificate.

  • Question 3: How can the customer check the chassis number if he doesn’t have the original export certificate to bring the vehicle to the UAE?

Answer 3: The customer should communicate with the UAE embassy and submit a copy of the export certificate in order to receive a letter (from the embassy) allowing him to proceed with the service.

  • Question 4: Is a chassis test needed to renew an expired export certificate?

Answer 4: Yes.

  • Question 5: What are the inspection fees to export a heavy vehicle?

Answer 5: If the vehicle is owned by an individual, a chassis test must be undertaken and the fee is 35 AED. If the vehicle is owned by a company, a technical test must be undertaken and the fee is 130 AED.

  • Question 6: The export certificate expires and the customer has not exported the vehicle yet. What are the fines to be paid if the customer registers the vehicle without renewing the certificate?

Answer 6: There aren’t any fines, but the customer cannot renew the certificate. The customer must have a new insurance to export the vehicle via Dubai Customs.

  • Question 7: Is the resident allowed to issue an export vehicle if the residence visa has expired?

Answer 7: No, the resident must have a valid visa.

  • Question 8: Is the personal presence of the export plates owner and the holder of the export certificate along with the person who will be driving the vehicle outside the country mandatory?

Answer 8: Yes, the personal presence is mandatory.

  • Question 9: Is it possible to export a vehicle with window tinting films?

Answer 9: The new law requires the removal of the window tinting films before exporting the vehicle.

  • Question 10: What is the procedure if the customer imports a vehicle from abroad and decides to sell it before registering it or even decides to register it in another country?

Answer 10: If the company imports a vehicle, it may transfer its ownership. If an individual imports a vehicle, he can request a Vehicle Clearance Certificate to register it in any emirate.

  • Question 11: What is the procedure if the customer has an export certificate which is valid for 15 days only and it expires?

Answer 11: A chassis test is required.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer or the legal representative must be present in person
  • The customer must have a selling agreement from an authorised dealer in Dubai in case the seller was unable to attend
  • The customer is required to settle all the traffic fines before receiving this service
  • In case of exporting the vehicle to the same owner with insurance, the remaining period of the insurance can be used to issue export plates if the vehicle is registered
  • After using the certificate, the customer must immediately return the plates to RTA. The customer is not allowed to drive the vehicle
  • The customer must open a traffic file if he doesn't have a file in Dubai
  • The customer must add Salik tag on the plates
  • The plates are subject to all the provisions of the traffic law with respect to fines
  • The customer cannot drive the vehicle on internal roads. Driving the vehicle is only allowed on main roads leading in and out of the country.

fields.Description: This service enables you to apply for issuing a vehicle export certificate to export a vehicle outside the UAE either with or without export plates.
fields.Eligibility: Individual customers, citizens and residents, and companies are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
For individuals

  1. Vehicle's documents: Vehicle Clearance Certificate (VCC) or transfer certificate or possession certificate or ownership certificate or possession transfer certificate
  2. Original Emirates ID
  3. Vehicle's plates to hand over
  4. Report from the police if 1 or both plates are lost and if the plate number of the motorcycle is lost
  5. Vehicle technical inspection in case of an expired license or a non-licensed vehicle
  6. Electronic redemption of the mortgage in case of a mortgaged vehicle
  7. If the customer requests the exportation of vehicle under the name of another owner: new insurance to issue export plates
  8. Vehicle insurance: export insurance valid for 14 days if the customer requests export plates + copy of the driver's driving license which must be issued in the UAE or a GCC country since licenses issued in other countries are not accepted when exporting a vehicle with plates
  9. If the customer does not have a traffic file: copy of the passport or the original Emirates ID.

For companies

  1. Vehicle's documents: Vehicle Clearance Certificate (VCC) or transfer certificate or possession certificate or ownership certificate or possession transfer certificate
  2. Official letter in Arabic
  3. Copy of the trade license
  4. Endorsement of signature and Authorization letter.
  5. Vehicle's plates to hand over
  6. Report from the police if 1 or both plates are lost and if the plate number of the motorcycle is lost
  7. Vehicle technical inspection in case of an expired license or a non-licensed vehicle
  8. Electronic redemption of the mortgage in case of a mortgaged vehicle
  9. If the customer requests the exportation of vehicle under the name of another owner: new insurance to issue export plates
  10. Vehicle insurance: export insurance valid for 14 days if the customer requests export plates + copy of the driver's driving license which must be issued in the UAE or a GCC country since licenses issued in other countries are not accepted when exporting a vehicle with plates
  11. Copy of the trade license if the customer does not have a traffic file

name: Apply for Adding a New Vehicle to Salik Account

fields.Average Waiting Time:
• Website: instantly
  • Mobile application: instantly
  • Centres: 10 minutes
  • Salik call centre: instantly.
fields.Channels - Customer Happiness Centres:
• Customer Happiness Centre - Umm Ramool
  • Customer Happiness Centre - Al Towar
  • Customer Happiness Centre - Deira
fields.Channels - Call Centre: • Salik Self Service on Salik Call Centre: 80072545.
fields.Output: Adding new vehicle to current Salik account.
fields.Service Fees: • This service is free.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must register on Salik website
  • The vehicle must be listed on the traffic file of the customer
  • Online registration is available only for UAE registered vehicles. All other vehicles will be registered offline through a form filled when buying the tag that is activated within 10 days from its purchase date but can be used to drive through Salik gates immediately
  • Customers with online accounts have to sign in and use the "Add a Vehicle" form instead.
fields.Process:
Through website and mobile application

  • The customer logs in using the username and password
  • The customer chooses the vehicles section
  • The customer enters the traffic file number, the details of the plate, the mobile number and the vehicle’s details
  • Once the vehicle is added, the customer can easily make future changes by logging in to the website and choosing the vehicles section.

Through service centre

  • The customer presents the traffic file number, the details of the plate, the mobile number, the vehicle’s details and Salik tag number
  • The vehicle will be added to the customer Salik account.

Through Salik self service on Salik call centre

  • The customer needs to provide on call the following details: the traffic file number, the details of the plate, the mobile number, the vehicle’s details and Salik tag number.
  • The vehicle will be added immediately to the customer Salik account.

• Website: instantly

  • Call centre: instantly.

name: Apply for Amending a Vehicle Ownership Data

fields.Process Time:
• Online channels and call centre: 3 working days
  • Customer happiness centres and service providers: 5 minutes.
fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: What is ownership e-card and what details it includes?

Answer 1: The ownership e-card is an electronic document called (Vehicle License) sent to the customer via email. It includes all the ownership details including the expiry date, mortgage and insurance. This e-card is issued by the Road and Transport Authority and the customer has to print it or save it on their phone to show it to concerned authorities when needed.

  • Question 2: How can customers print the ownership e-card or any other document in case they didn’t receive an email or they wanted to verify the vehicle details, renewal date and insurance details?

Answer 2: The ownership e-card may be printed as follows:

    • Login to rta.ae.
    • Select Licensing services.
    • Scroll down the Certificate Verification service and press "Click Here".
    • Select service type "Vehicle License" then enter the vehicle details to show the print order.
  • Question 3: What details are featured on the vehicle license?

Answer 3: The vehicle license features all the details related to the vehicle including the expiry date, the mortgage and the insurance details. It is sent via email to the customer in a printable format.

  • Question 4: What happens when police patrols or officers request the ownership card?

Answer 4: The customer shows the ownership e-card featured in RTA applications and saved on his phone, or shows the printed copy of the e-card.

  • Question 5: How does the customer show the e-card to the licensing department?

Answer 5: The customer shows the ownership e-card featured in RTA applications and saved on his phone, or shows the printed copy of the e-card.

  • Question 6: How can the customer access the insurance details?

Answer 6: The insurance details are featured on the ownership e-card accessible through RTA mobile application, or on the printed copy of the vehicle license.

  • Question 7: How can the customer access the mortgage details?

Answer 7: Mortgage details are features on all the documents.

  • Question 8: What happens when the ownership details are amended?

Answer 8: In case any of the vehicle details get amended such as changing the plate number or the color:

    • Details are updated on the ownership e-card and the vehicle’s license.
  • Question 9: What happens in case of loss or damage of the permanent ownership certificate?

Answer 9: A new copy is issued against the due fee.

  • Question 10: In case the customer doesn’t have RTA application, can the vehicle license be printed through the customer service centre?

Answer 10: There is no need for the customer service representative to print the vehicle license. The customer may print it through the link sent via email.

  • Question 11: Is the customer obliged to replace the vehicle license once the electronic ownership phase implemented?

Answer 11: The ownership certificate is replaced only upon its renewal, or in case of replacement of lost/damaged license or change in ownership document such as change of color or plate number or adding or redeeming a mortgage.

  • Question 12: In case the customer’s phone number was registered wrongly, how can the link be resent to him?

Answer 12: The customers shall update their personal details though RTA Call Centre: 8009090. Also he can print the ownership e-card as follows:

    • Login to rta.ae.
    • Select Licensing services
    • Scroll down the Certificate Verification service and press "Click Here"
    • Select service type "Vehicle License" then enter the vehicle details to show the print order.
  • Question 13: How can customers check the expiry date of their vehicle license?

Answer 13: The vehicle’s expiry date can be checked in several ways:

    • Through the details featured on the vehicle’s license
    • Through the short messages sent to the customers’ mobile numbers.
fields.Process:
Through website or mobile application

  • The customer logs in using the username and password
  • The customer enters the vehicle's information
  • The customer is required to settle the fees and the traffic fines
  • The customer receives the amended ownership certificate from the Customer Happiness Centre in Deira or Al Barsha or through a courier company for a charge of 25 AED. The courier company makes 3 attempts to deliver the certificate before sending it back to the centre where the customer collects it.

Note: The customer can apply for this service through the website or the mobile application only when amending the insurance or mortgage information or the vehicle's specifications.

Through customer happiness centres or service providers

  • The customer presents the required documents
  • The customer is required to settle the fees
  • The customer receives the certificate.

Through call centre

  • The customer contacts the call centre on the following number: 8009090
  • The customer requests the amendment of the vehicle's information
  • The customer is required to settle the fees by credit card or e-wallet
  • The customer receives the certificate from the Customer Happiness Centre in Deira or Al Barsha or through a courier company for a charge of 25 AED. The courier company makes 3 attempts to deliver the service before sending it back to the centre where the customer collects it.
fields.Output: Vehicle ownership certificate.
fields.Service Fees:
• 50 AED new ownership certificate
  • 100 AED ownership amendment
  • 500 AED advertisement sticker fees
  • 500 AED to add another advertisement sticker
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Validity: Same validity period as the original ownership certificate.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must pay all the traffic fines before receiving this service
  • The customer must check the validity of the vehicle's ownership
  • In case of amending the mortgage information, the customer must electronically add the mortgage or redeem it at the bank.
  • To change the insurance company, the customer must electronically enter the new insurance and cancel the old one that's already in the system
  • The customer cannot paint the vehicle using the colours designated for armed forces and government departments and cannot use sticky window sun shades.

fields.Description: This service enables you to amend the information of the vehicle ownership certificate issued in Dubai.
fields.ELigibility: Individual customers, citizens and residents, and companies are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
Adding an advertisement sticker (for companies)

  1. Vehicle ownership certificate
  2. Official letter in Arabic from the company
  3. Copy of the valid trade license
  4. Endorsement of signature and Authorization letter or the presence of the representative
  5. Vehicle technical inspection certificate
  6. Permit to add an advertisement sticker (the customer receives it from the Customer Happiness Centre - Umm Ramool).

Amending the type of the vehicle: truck/Van (cooler) (for companies)

  1. Approval of Dubai Municipality or municipal test certificate from one of RTA's service centres
  2. Official letter in Arabic from the company clarifying the nature of change
  3. Copy of the trade license
  4. Endorsement of signature and Authorization letter
  5. Vehicle technical inspection certificate.

Changing the vehicle's color (for individuals and companies)

  1. Vehicle ownership certificate
  2. Vehicle technical inspection certificate
  3. Letter from the Criminal Investigation Department at Dubai Police
  4. For individuals: original Emirates ID to update the information in case of an expired ID and to verify the identity of the applicant
  5. For companies: Official letter in Arabic from the company clarifying the nature of change + Copy of the trade license + Endorsement of signature and Authorization letter or the presence of the representative.

• The Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) keeps the Abra operating permit and issues a maintenance permit when the customer applies for the service

  • The customer must carry out periodic maintenance activities every year (at least every 6 months)

  • The customer receives the final NOC through the website upon the approval of all the service authorities listed in the application.

  • The customer must commit to the rules and regulations related to work within the Right of Way
  • The customer must commit to the conditions of the concerned service authorities stated on the final NOC.

name: Apply for an Insurance Refund Certificate

fields.Output: Refund certificate of the insurance amount.
fields.Service Fees:
• 100 AED certificate fee
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer or the legal representative must be present in person
  • The customer is required to settle all the traffic fines before receiving this service
  • The customer cannot apply for the refund certificate online if the buyer/new owner has made another transaction with the vehicle. For example:
    • Transferring the vehicle to the buyer's name
    • Transferring the vehicle to another emirate or exporting it or issuing a possession certificate ( a second transaction)

In this case the seller will not be able to apply for the insurance refund certificate online.
fields.Process:
Through website and mobile application

  • The customer logs in using the username and password
  • The customer enters the number of the plate and its code
  • The customer proceeds to insurance refund certificate
  • The customer is required to settle the fees by credit card
  • The customer receives the service from the service centre (Deira or Umm Ramool) or through a courier company for a charge of 25 AED. The courier company makes 3 attempts to deliver the service before sending it back to the centre where the customer collects it.

Through customer happiness centres or service providers

  • The customer submits the required documents
  • The customer is required to settle the fees
  • The customer receives the certificate.
fields.Process Time:
• Website: unidentified
  • Mobile application: unidentified
  • Customer happiness centres and service providers: 10 minutes.
fields.Related Services: Customers can verify all e-certificates online using the documents validation service available on RTA portal home page: http://www.rta.ae/ecertificate.
fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: Can the customer apply for this transaction online if the vehicle ownership has been transferred to another person?

Answer 1: If the vehicle ownership was transferred to another person in Dubai, the system will view the vehicle as registered and the transaction cannot be done online or via the call centre. Therefore, the customer needs to proceed to Deira Licensing and apply for this transaction.

If the vehicle ownership was transferred to another Emirate/exported/registered on a possession certificate, the transaction can be done online.
fields.Required Documents:
For individuals

  1. Original Emirates ID to update the information
  2. Document stating the data of the vehicle.

For companies

  1. Official letter in Arabic from the company
  2. Copy of the trade license
  3. Document stating the data of the vehicle.
fields.Average Waiting Time:
• Website: instantly
  • Mobile application: instantly
  • Customer happiness centres and service providers: 10 minutes.

name: Apply for an NOC for a New Trade License

fields.Process:
Through website

  • The customer visits the website and clicks on "Licensing Services"
  • The customer clicks on "NOC for a New Trade License"
  • The customer approves the terms and conditions after reading them
  • The customer clicks on "Apply for service"
  • The customer enters the required applicant details and the security code then clicks on the "Confirm and Proceed" button
  • The customer clicks on "Add Activity" from "Add Organisation Activities/Members" section to add an activity
  • The customer clicks on the "Add Member" button and then clicks "Confirm and Pay" to add a member
  • The customer uploads the required attachments according to the member's nationality:
    • Citizen: Emirates ID
    • Citizen (with no identification papers): Passport
    • GCC citizen: Passport and Union Number
    • Resident: Passport + residence visa or visa
  • The customer clicks on the "Submit" button. The system directs the customer to a page as per the company activity
  • The system generates a new application number for the request and sends it to the Employee of Administrative Procedures (EPS) for review
  • The customer is notified of the status of the application through e-mail or SMS
  • The customer gets the approval

Note: The customer can check the status of his application by accessing the "follow up a request status" service on RTA website.
fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: As a resident, why should I present my visa and passport instead of my Emirates ID?

Answer 1: The visa has the sponsor name. However, Emirates ID doesn’t – so visa and passport are both needed.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The company must have an approval from other governmental agencies for some business activities (check the table below)
  • The company must check with the Finance Department at RTA (PO Box 118 899 Dubai, United Arab Emirates) if it believes that it has the right to get a refund
  • RTA reserves the right to reject the application in case of fraud or misleading information and will be attended to as per the UAE law.

name: Apply for an NOC for School Transport Activities

fields.Description: This service enables you to obtain a No Objection Certificate (NOC) for schools and nurseries in Dubai before renewing the license in order to make sure that the institution is compliant with the School Transport Control Law in Dubai Emirate No. 2 of 2008, and its latest amendments in July 2014. The law is issued by Dubai Government Executive Council to enhance the school transport services in the Emirate and develop them in a distinct manner.
fields.Eligibility: Schools and nurseries are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Copy of the contract to transport students between schools and other parties
  2. List of the mobile numbers of parties in charge of organising school transport (supervisor + contracting party)
  3. Mobile numbers of guides and drivers
  4. Copy of the ownership certificate of each vehicle
  5. Copy of the permit to work as a school bus driver for all drivers
  6. Copy of the maintenance certificate
  7. Route of the buses
  8. Letter specifying the overall number of students using the school bus
  9. Copy of the female supervisors’ permits
  10. Copy of the ID and the passport of the female supervisors
  11. Copy of the occupational license.
fields.Output: NOC for school transport activities.
fields.Service Fees: • 20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must fill in the required details according to the online form
  • The request will be cancelled within 10 working days if the customer does not complete the required process to receive the NOC.

Through website

  • The customer creates an account using a username and password
  • The customer logs in and chooses “managing the account” and then proceeds to “issuing NOC for schools and nurseries”
  • The customer fills in the form
  • The customer receives a temporary NOC from the website
  • The customer heads to the Planning and Business Development Department at RTA to receive the NOC.
fields.Process Time: • 2 working days if all the required documents are provided.

fields.Service Fees: • This service is free.
fields.Validity: 6 months from the date of issuance of the final NOC (the validity is mentioned in the final NOC).
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must submit the supporting documents to the service authorities within 10 days after the electronic submission of the application (in case the supporting documents attached to the application are submitted in person)
  • The customer must fulfill all the requirements of the service authorities and must get the approval of all the concerned service authorities within 2 months after the submission to avoid cancellation
  • The customer must provide all the supporting documents according to the list available on the e-NOC website before the electronic submission of the application
  • The customer must commit to the rules and regulations related to work within the Right of Way
  • The customer must commit to the conditions of the concerned service authorities stated on the final NOC.
fields.FAQs: To check the frequently asked questions related to the service, the customer must visit the e-NOC website.
fields.Process Time: • 14 working days after the submission of the supporting documents.
fields.Process:
Through online channels

  • The customer logs in to the e-NOC system using the username and password
  • The customer chooses the desired type of NOC
  • The customer fills in the required details
  • The customer uploads the supporting documents when submitting them electronically or submits the supporting documents at the Customer Happiness Centre in Umm Ramool
  • The customer checks the status of the application through the online channels and checks the comments of the service authorities (if any) and acts accordingly
  • The customer receives the final NOC through the website upon the approval of all the service authorities listed in the application.

name: Apply for an NOC to Add or Remove a Shareholder or a Manager on a Trade license

fields.Process:
Through website

  • Add a new shareholder/manager
    • The customer visits the website and clicks on 'Licensing Services'
    • The customer clicks on "Amending Trade License Data" from the express services list
    • The customer approves on the terms and conditions after reading them
    • The customer clicks on 'Apply on this service'
    • The customer enters the company information (traffic file and trade license numbers) and the security code then clicks on 'Search'
    • The customer chooses " Add a member" from the company details list screen
    • The customer fills in the information on the 'Add a member' screen and then clicks on 'Submit'
    • The system directs the customer to a page as per the company activity
    • The customer uploads the required attachments according to the customer's nationality:
      • Citizen: Emirates ID
      • Citizen (with no identification papers): Passport
      • GCC nationals: Passport + Union Number
      • Resident: Passport + residence visa number
      • Company: Copy of the trade license
    • The customer clicks on 'Submit' button from the fees screen
    • RTA system generates a new application number for the request and sends it to the Employee of Administrative Procedures (EPS) for review.
  • Delete a shareholder/manager
    • The customer visits the website and clicks on 'Licensing Services'
    • The customer clicks on "Add or remove a shareholder/manager on a trade license" from the express services list
    • The customer approves on the terms and conditions after reading them
    • The customer clicks on 'Apply on this service'
    • The customer enters the company information (traffic file and the trade license numbers) and the security code then clicks on 'Search'
    • The customer chooses "Remove a member" from the company details list screen
    • The customer clicks on 'Submit' and the system directs you to a page as per the company activity.
    • The customer clicks on the 'Submit' button from the fees screen
    • RTA system generates a new application number for the request and sends it to the Employee of Administrative Procedures (EPS) for review
    • The customer is redirected to a web-page to print the NOC.
fields.Process Time:
• Adding a shareholder: 3 days
  • Removing or adding a manager: few minutes
  • Removing a shareholder: few minutes.
fields.Description: This service enables you to apply for a No Objection Certificate (NOC) to add or remove shareholder or manager on a trade license.
fields.Eligibility: Licensed company by the Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) are eligible to apply for this service.
fields.Required Documents:
1. Copies of the passports of the partners
  2. Emirates ID
  3. Residence visa or valid visit visa
  4. NOC by the sponsor in case the partner is a non GCC citizen
  5. Preliminary approval of the licensing authorities (Department of Economic Development and Free Zones)
  6. Copy of the trade license
  7. Copy of the company trade license in case of adding it as a partner.
fields.Output: NOC to add or remove shareholder/manager on a trade license.
fields.Service Fees:
• From 500 to 1000 AED when removing a shareholder
  • From 500 to 10,000 AED to add a shareholder for all activities
  • 2,000 AED to add a shareholder for the activity of transporting passengers by rented buses
  • 500 AED to add or remove a manager
  • 4,000 AED to waiver for the activity of transporting passengers by rented buses
  • 100 AED to waiver for remaining activities
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must not have pending payments or fines
  • The customer must check with the Finance Department at RTA (PO Box 118 899 Dubai, United Arab Emirates) if he believes that he has the right to get a refund
  • The company must settle all pending fines at the Supervision and Inspection Department if any are accumulated on the trade license
  • RTA reserves the right to reject the application in case of fraud or misleading information and will be attended to as per the United Arab Emirates (UAE) law

name: Apply for an NOC to Add/Remove a Partner on a Trade License for the Activity of Transporting Passengers in Luxury Vehicles

fields.Process:
Through website

  • The customer logs in to RTA website (Licensing services/express services) and chooses NOC to amend a trade license
  • The customer agrees on the terms and conditions after reading them
  • The customer applies to the service
  • The application is subject to primarily approval from the relevant organizational units (Finance Department, Procurement Department and Franchise Services Department)
  • The customer receives a notification from RTA to proceed with the transaction through the electronic gate
  • The customer enters the receipt and verification details and the proof of settling the fees
  • The customer prints the certificate and proceeds to the Department of Economic Development/Free Zones to continue the transaction
  • The customer submits an application to update the trade license information through the website (Licensing services/express services).
fields.Related Services:
Services related to the procedure

  • Issuing NOC to renew a trade license
  • Reviewing trade license requests
  • Updating details of trade license
  • Reprinting a document.
fields.FAQs:
• Question 1: What does primarily approval from the relevant organizational units means?

Answer 1: RTA departments related to transport passengers by luxury vehicles activity, examine the electronic application to check the company's compliance with its financial and contractual obligations.
fields.Output:
• NOC to amend the trade license of the company
  • A letter for the public notary with the details of the partners and their shares
  • Receipt of the transaction and payment data.
fields.Service Fees:
• 10,000 AED (for each application) for an NOC to add a partner
  • +20 AED Knowledge and Innovation fees.
fields.Terms and Conditions:
• The customer must obtain a security approval on the partners/owner of the license to proceed with the transaction. The transaction cannot be completed without this approval even if other requirements are fulfilled
  • The customer must specify the details of a new main partner when requesting the removal of the original main partner and must amend the shares if the new partner is a contributor or a member of this license
  • The customer must specify the shares when adding a partner to the trade license; for non-partners, the customer is not asked to specify the number of shares
  • The new partner must sign a pledge stipulating his full awareness of all financial and contractual engagements of the company as well as of the activity requirements up till the date of the amend request
  • The customer must notify the new partner of all obligations incurred by the company and the number of vehicles to be completed to meet the contracted number
  • If the signatory of the contract or deferred checks quit the company, this latter must refer to the Finance Department and the Contract and Procurement Department to complete the financial and contractual procedures
  • The company must have fulfilled all its financial and contractual commitments to RTA
  • The company must clear any impediments in its traffic file (delay in replacement fines, quality and traffic violations, unpayable fines)
  • If the application was rejected by any of the organizational units, the customer must comply with the requirements and reapply for this service
  • The customer must not have another uncompleted application with the same data being under process
fields.Required Documents:
1. Copies of the passports of the partners
  2. Emirates ID
  3. Residence visa or valid visit visa
  4. NOC by the sponsor in case the partner is a non GCC citizen
  5. Preliminary approval of the licensing authorities (Department of Economic Development and Free Zones)
  6. Copy of the trade license
  7. Copy of the company trade license in case of adding it as a partner.
